__e: Besides, I repeat that it's absurd to talk about this... until we see how the operation has gone.
Well, I don't think that's a good idea, sir.
Now I insist you get back into that bed and take one of these pills immediately.
But I insist you inform me if there is any change in George's condition.
I just need someone to take me to the hospital ... and I insist that I do not know why.
However, I stress that it is an event that went very well and is in the past!
What I want to know - no, what I insist upon knowing, is how she knew about our operation.
You know, this is the first time in my life I ever insisted on helping a woman find her husband.
I insist on knowing why you came to this room and had a gun in your hand.
